articles.title: Schools, social events shut down over coronavirus fears
articles.description: Iran's health ministry has confirmed 43 cases of the novel coronavirus, including eight deaths. Schools, theaters and sporting events have been shut down over fears the virus will spread. Journalist Ramin Mostaghim reports from Tehran, Iran.

articles.title: Coronavirus is fast becoming an 'economic pandemic'

articles.description: Shares of American biotech firm Gilead Sciences rose 3% Monday after an official from the World Health Organization said that Gilead's drug remdesivir is showing signs that it may be able to help treat the deadly coronavirus.
